item.description:
VEGWORCESTER PRESENTS:

The S ug ar Mama Vegan Cookie Swap!

Get your apron out -  the cookie competition will be fierce!


Free / Ugly sweaters & holiday attire encouraged!


Photos with Santaaaa!!! by Worcester Photo Studios
 
Kick-Ass Prizes for:
Most delicious vegan cookie
Most attrac tive vegan cookie / cookie display
Most awesomeugly sweater or holiday attire

Feel free to bring any vegan drinks/food to share. Note: If you don’t have time to bake/enter the swap but want to attend the partay, you can’t participate in the actual cookie swap, but alternatively could bring a vegan food/drink item to share, participate in ugly sweater/holiday attire contest and have your photo taken with santar. Do it.

If you plan to enter, please post a comment below!

________________________________________

COOKIE SWAP RULES

All cookie ingredients must be vegan. No exceptions. This means no eggs, milk, dairy, honey, gelatin, etc.

 

  • Please bring 6 dozen total cookies. Why 6 dozen? It sounds like a lot, but to make the event work, people can taste 1 of your cookies at the party and take a couple of your cookies home. (For example, if we have 15 entrants that each make 6 dozen cookies everyone will be able to taste one of your cookies at the party and bring 2 of your cookies home, and it leaves a few extra cookies for you as testers.)

    All entries must be cookie-like. They should be homemade or from a vegan bakery. Stray way from cookie mixes and anything with wet toppings that don’t dry. We don’t want 30 plain chocolate chip entries, be creative!

    Arrange cookie entry on a platter and bring another large container to carry away your cookies.

    Label your cookies! And Bring a copy of your recipe with ingredients.

    Our advice: Make your cookies the night before, so you’re not rushing and cookies have time to cool/dry.
  • Everyone's cookies get lined up on a table with the index cards showing the name & ingredients of each cookie
  • Each person tells the group what type of cookie they made and how the baking went.
  • Everyone lines up and gets at least 1 cookie from each batch of cookies on the table! (If there are less bakers, everyone will get more than 2 or 3 of each kind!)
  • You get to leave with a container full of different varieties of tasty vegan cookies and hopefully some new friends ;)

 

There is also a Facebook Event for this: http://www.facebook.com/events/128536610590307

Email manda@vegworcester.com if you have any questions!
item.how_to_find_us: Blue Building, on May Street, in between Big Y and CVS. Park in the parking lot, or along the street
item.name: Sugar Mama Vegan Cookie Swap & Holiday Party
